Articles.Content:
hello there guys

i'm sure you heard about EdTools by DeadBeef and the fact that it's not updated

if you're looking for .21 version, i found it here>>http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/editor-extensions/

I tried it and honestly, aside from the Vertical Snap, didn't find it helped me much in construction. All it really did for me was slow down the VAB. I'm sure some people will find it very useful, though.
